body_html: I've been using Open MPI installed from the Ubuntu repos and the tests pass. From #4965 looks like mpich does not support --noprefix flag which is needed when using virtual environments (such as conda) in Open MPI - #3792. I think we can check for the --noprefix flag support and use it only if it is supported.

body: I've been using Open MPI installed from the Ubuntu repos and the tests pass. From #4965 looks like `mpich` does not support `--noprefix` flag which is needed when using virtual environments (such as conda) in Open MPI - #3792. I think we can check for the `--noprefix` flag support and use it only if it is supported.
